title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), the following error message appears: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.' I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Could you please provide an explanation for this error message?
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project, such as 'org.apache.ant', the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' appears. I am not able to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
EB: I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a binary project, such as 'org.apache.ant'. 
2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy. 
3. Observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
